main event: A bright, round, white light was observed in a fast, erratic motion for 10 minutes in Succasunna, New Jersey on 21 September 1961.
interesting points: The weather conditions included considerable ground fog, limiting visibility to 1.5 miles., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object was seen only by the observer., There is a possibility that the object was a balloon, while the investigator suggested it could be a missile or satellite., The observer had noted strange flying objects on several previous occasions.
